description: This PHP script handles AJAX requests for configuring WAN additional subnets, including adding, editing, deleting, enabling, and disabling subnet entries. It performs validation, session authentication, and interacts with device configuration data models.

methods.name: setStr
methods.description: Sets a configuration string value in the device data model.

methods.name: addTblObj
methods.description: Adds a new table object in the device configuration.

methods.name: delTblObj
methods.description: Deletes a table object from the device configuration.

methods.name: DmExtGetInstanceIds
methods.description: Retrieves instance IDs for a given configuration table.

methods.name: isPrivate_Addr
methods.description: Checks if an IP address is within private IP ranges.
